大盛況: (だいせいきょう) - great success/roaring business; busy/packed-out
大盤: (おおばん) - demonstration board (for Go, Shougi, etc.)
大盤振る舞い: (おおばんふるまい) - lavish feast/splendid banquet; corporate largess/lavish hospitality
大盤振舞: (おうばんぶるまい) - lavish feast/splendid banquet; corporate largess/lavish hospitality
大盤振舞い: (おうばんぶるまい) - lavish feast/splendid banquet; corporate largess/lavish hospitality
大盤石: (だいばんじゃく) - large rock; rock-solid
大目に見る: (おおめにみる) - to tolerate; to condone; to overlook; to let pass
大目付: (おおめつけ) - (government) inspector-general (Edo period); upper superintendent officer
大目大千鳥: (オオメダイチドリ) - greater sand plover (Charadrius leschenaultii)
大目玉をくらう: (おおめだまをくらう) - to get scolded severely
大目玉を食らう: (おおめだまをくらう) - to get scolded severely
大目白鮫: (オオメジロザメ) - bull shark (Carcharhinus leucas)
大直備神: (おおなおびのかみ) - great god of restoration
大直毘神: (おおなおびのかみ) - great god of restoration
大相場: (おおそうば) - boom (e.g. in stock prices)
大相撲さん: (おおずもうさん) - {sumo} unofficial term for professional wrestlers
大看板: (おおかんばん) - billboard/large signboard; first-rate influential performer (theatre, film, etc.)/leading star/draw/attraction
大知: (だいち) - (ant: 小智・1) supreme wisdom; sage
大石: (おおいし) - large stone/boulder; large group of stones (in the game of go)
大砲三門: (たいほうさんもん) - three cannons
大磐石: (だいばんじゃく) - large rock; rock-solid
大礼: (たいれい) - imperial or state ceremony
大礼服: (たいれいふく) - court dress; full-dress uniform
大社: (おおやしろ) - (たいしゃ only) {Shinto} grand shrine/famous shrine; {Shinto} Izumo Grand Shrine
大社教: (たいしゃきょう) - Taisha-kyo (sect of Shinto; renamed Izumo Oyashiro-kyo in 1951)
大社造り: (おおやしろづくり) - oldest architectural style for Shinto shrines (e.g. used at Izumo shrine)
大祓: (おおはらい) - {Shinto}  great purification; purification rite performed twice a year, before daijôsai and after major disasters
大祓の詞: (おおはらえのことば) - {Shinto}  norito read at a great purification event
大祖国戦争: (だいそこくせんそう) - Great Patriotic War (Russian name for the war along the eastern front during World War II)
大神宮: (だいじんぐう) - the Grand Shrine at Ise
大神楽: (ダイカグラ) - grand kagura performance at Ise; type of performance including the lion dance and juggling; Camellia japonica 'Daikagura' (cultivar of Japanese camellia)
大禍時: (おおまがとき) - twilight; time for disasters (similar to 'the witching hour' but not midnight)
大禍津日神: (おおまがつひのかみ) - the great evil god
大福: (だいふく) - great fortune/good luck; rice cake stuffed with bean jam
大福茶: (だいふくちゃ) - tea prepared for the New Year with the first water of the year
大福餅: (だいふくもち) - rice cake stuffed with sweet bean jam
大穴: (おおあな) - large hole; great deficit/heavy losses; big and unexpected winnings/a killing (e.g. on a race); dark horse (horse racing)
大穴牟遅命: (おおあなむちのみこと) - Okuninushi; deity of magic and medicine later viewed as equivalent to Daikokuten and celebrated at Izumo Grand Shrine
大穴牟遅神: (おおなむちのかみ) - Okuninushi; deity of magic and medicine later viewed as equivalent to Daikokuten and celebrated at Izumo Grand Shrine
大空位時代: (だいくういじだい) - Great Interregnum (gap between Hohenstaufen and Habsburg rule of the Holy Roman Empire, approx. 1254-1273 CE)
大空襲: (だいくうしゅう) - major air raid; blitz
大立者: (おおだてもの) - bigwig; leading or prominent figure
大童: (おおわらわ) - strenuous efforts; hard fighting
大笑: (たいしょう) - loud laughter; hearty laugh
大笑い: (おおわらい) - great laughter; burst of laughter
大篆: (だいてん) - large seal script (dating from China's Spring and Autumn period onward)
大簇: (たいぞく) - (in China) 3rd note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. E); first lunar month
大粟反: (オオアワガエリ) - timothy (Phleum pratense); timothy grass
大糸掛貝: (オオイトカケガイ) - precious wentletrap (Epitonium scalare)
大納会: (だいのうかい) - last session (trading day, trading) of the year
大納言: (だいなごん) - chief councillor of state/chief councilor of state; large-grained variety of adzuki bean
大紫: (オオムラサキ) - giant purple butterfly (species of nymphalid butterfly, Sasakia charonda); Rhododendron oomurasaki (species of purple azalea)
大統一理論: (だいとういつりろん) - grand unified theory
大統領: (daitouryou) - presidente (de uma nação ou empresa), diretor-executivo; chefe, cara importante, patrão, amigo
大統領代行: (だいとうりょうだいこう) - acting president
大統領候補: (だいとうりょうこうほ) - presidential candidate
大統領制: (だいとうりょうせい) - presidential system; presidential government
大統領夫人: (だいとうりょうふじん) - first lady
大統領布告: (だいとうりょうふこく) - presidential decree; presidential proclamation
大統領経済報告: (だいとうりょうけいざいほうこく) - Economic Report of the President (US)
大統領補佐官: (だいとうりょうほさかん) - presidential aide
大統領選: (だいとうりょうせん) - presidential election
大統領選挙: (だいとうりょうせんきょ) - presidential election
大絶賛: (だいぜっさん) - rave reviews; extremely high praise
大綱: (taikou) - princípios fundamentais, linhas principais; esboço, resumo, características gerais
大纛: (たいとう) - (also written as 大頭) large decorative black flagpole tassel made from tail hair (of a yak, horse, ox, etc.) or dyed hemp; emperor's encampment
大罪: (たいざい) - serious crime; grave sin
大群: (たいぐん) - large crowd; large herd; large flock; large school; large shoal; swarm
大義: (たいぎ) - great cause; moral law; justice
大義名分: (たいぎめいぶん) - (yoji) a just cause
大羽: (おおばね) - contour feather; quill feather
大耳狐: (オオミミギツネ) - bat-eared fox (Otocyon megalotis)
